message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand that $250 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $200 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $175?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer it to you for $225, which is the lowest I can go.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $180?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $220, that's my absolute minimum. I'm starting to think it's time to consider other buyers...
